applet.name: EnhancedDigitalOutput
applet.title: Enhanced Digital Output
applet.desc: Support for external USB Dacs and up to 192kHz sampling rates with the digital output. Note: this app will install a custom linux kernel. It will also disable analog when using usb/digital out.
applet.creator: Triode

applet.name: SetupKernelUpdater
applet.title: Kernel Updater
applet.desc: Experienced users only. Applet to install trial kernel versions to test USB audio support. Kernels are installed at your own risk
applet.creator: Triode

applet.name: DisplayOff
applet.title: Display Off
applet.desc: Replacement for Screen Off screensaver which disables screen processing when off. Intended to be used as a when playing or when off screensaver.
applet.creator: Triode
